abstract_summ: In December 2019, 54 cases of viral pneumonia emerged in Wuhan, China, caused by some unknown microorganism . Virus responsible for these pneumonia infections was identified as novel coronavirus of the family Coronaviridae . Infection from the virus has since increased exponentially and has spread all over the world in more than 196 countries . Social distancing, international travel restrictions to affected countries, and hygiene are three important ways to nullify SARS-CoV-2 .
